item.title: Untaxed or unroadworthy vehicle parked on public road, 26th October
item.description:
There’s a silver Vauxhall (registration YE56 TXP) parked on the street which has no valid MOT (expired 26 September 2025). The vehicle is taxed but should not be parked or driven on a public road without a valid MOT. It’s been stationary for several weeks and may be abandoned or unroadworthy.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harting Road, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing street name sign, 26th October
item.description:

item.title: On 3 points of Christchurch Road between the corners of Chatsworth Road and Mowbray Road, 26th October
item.description:
Large raised cracks in the footpath due to tree roots which get very slippery with the addition of increased leaf fall at this time of year. Should be seen to with haste as I saw an elderly man fall on this part of the road a few days ago

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Christchurch Avenue, London

item.title: Continuous domestic dumping, 26th October
item.description:
Hi, thank you for clearing the area after my previous reports, but this problem is continuous, bags and other waste are left here every day. Please could you do something more than clearing it, ie. move the bin, put up signs/cameras or prosecute the perps.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Church Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox in my back garden (73 Macoma Road), 26th October
item.description:
There is a dead fox in my back garden. I don't think it has been there more than a day or so, as I have been in the garden to put washing out a couple of days ago.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Macoma Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
